tool.name: Elprep
tool.description: Remove unmapped reads, Sort Contig order, Sort coordinate order, Marks duplicate reads and Add RG information in SAM/BAM files
tool.command:
elprep_wrapper.py --input $input_file --input_file_type $input_file_type --output $output_file
-p '
## Replace Reference Sequences? #if $replace_reference_sequences : --replace-reference-sequences $replace_reference_sequences #end if
## Filter Unmapped Reads? #if $filter_unmapped_reads : --filter-unmapped-reads $filter_unmapped_reads #end if
## Replace Read Group? #if $replace_read_group : --replace-read-group $replace_read_group #end if
## Mark Duplicates? #if $mark_duplicates_options : --mark-duplicates $mark_duplicates_options #else --mark-duplicates #end if
## Sorting Order? #if $sorting_order : --sorting-order $sorting_order #end if
## Clean SAM? #if $clean_sam : --clean-sam #end if
## Number of threads #if $num_threads : --nr-of-threads $num_threads #else --nr-of-threads "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-16}" #end if
## GC On? #if $gc_on : --gc-on $gc_on #end if
## Timed? #if $timed : --timed #end if
## Reference t? #if $reference_t_fai : --reference-t $reference_t_fai #end if
## Reference T? #if $reference_T_fasta : --reference-T $reference_T_fasta #end if
## Split File? #if $split_file : --split-file #end if
'

param.name: input_file
param.label: SAM or BAM file in which to mark duplicate reads

param.name: input_file_type
param.label: REQUIRED: Choose input file type for Elprep

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool uses Elprep to mark duplicate reads in a BAM file.
https://github.com/exascience/elprep
